description: Surgical patches for YAH Scriptures export anomalies

patches.text: And they were both naked, the man and his wife, and were not ashamed.
patches.reason: Source merge anomaly - verse missing in bbli export due to database merge
patches.source: YAH Scriptures bbli database, cross-referenced with KJV and Masoretic text
patches.author: Marc Seals
notes: This verse is present in the source .bbli file but was lost during export
Text verified against multiple translations (KJV, NKJV, ESV)
Masoretic reference: וַיִּהְיוּ שְׁנֵיהֶם עֲרוּמִּים הָאָדָם וְאִשְׁתּוֹ וְלֹא יִתְבֹּשָׁשׁוּ
